sectionNotes: Restricted to MS:Business Administrtn -UIUC, MS: Technology Management-UIUC, or MBA:Bus Administration -UIUC.
sectionText: This course is open to students pursuing the Graduate Concentration in Business Data Analytics. This course covers advanced techniques of data analytics, with an emphasis on the predictive perspective. This course provides both rationale and real-world applications of data analytics and is ideal for students seeking to extract insights from real data to support business decision-making.  In particular, students will learn to: (1) mine, summarize and visualize data (2) formulate, identify, and design optimal procedure for prediction, forecast and inferential decision-making (3) uncover and quantify the influence of performance drivers with data (4) draw data-driven conclusions to create competitive advantage for businesses.
